1.content: Choose the creatures or race you'd like! And if need be, specify which version of a creature you're using (FF12 Moogle as opposed to Moogles from the previous games etc). You may also use specific creature/race characters from the games (Migelo, Fran, Monteblanc, Babus Swain etc.)
1.title: Beginning the Fantasy

11.title: Moogles (Kupo!)

15.content: Not enough choices, eh? No problem; Final Fantasy is a pretty big franchise, after all. Here's some other good choices:
15.title: More!

151.content:
Ah, I see you want to know more about the majestic purple beasts in the final fantasy universe. If you've ever wanted to play around with one of these, now is your chance.

First off, which gender will the behemoth be?
151.title: Behemoths

1512.content: Next, will she be an anthro or non-anthro?
1512.title: Female behemoth?

15121.content:
After sneaking out of Dalmasca in the middle of the night, you, a male hume of 23 years, set foot into the Dalmasca Eastersand. "Great... now to get as far away from those imperials." You said as you head through the Eastersand, getting a close-up look at the wild saurian along the way, with the tyrant wyrm not seeing you. "Well, everyone knows wild saurians don't attack people unless they get hit first." You thought to yourself, as you headed over to the Giza Plains.

Upon entering the Giza plains, your eyes widen at the sight of a small blur of purple in the distance. "Huh? I thought Behemoths were usually in the final dungeon of... well... almost every final fantasy game out there." You thought as you approach that mystery behemoth, only to find that the behemoth was a...
15121.title: A behemoth babe?

151211.content:
As fate would have it, you have actually found a shapely, eight-foot-tall behemoth lady, clad in a strapless black latex malliot. She had long brown hair and was fast asleep on her M-cup assets. "Oooh, she has to be the envy of her kind." You thought as you began to approach her ever-so-slowly. However, you stop short a few feet. "I wonder if this beauty would use some enhancing." You think.

You began thinking further. "I dunno whether to feel her curves before or after I do my operation on her." You thought as your pervy thoughts keep running rampant. You move back several feet, then began thinking it over. "Grope her or fwoomp her? Whatever, those Viera certainly have nothing on this beauty. Oh, and I gotta be quick before she wakes up." You think, knowing how powerful behemoths are and fearing what this one will do if she's robbed of her beauty rest.
151211.title: The purple bombshell

1512111.content: You move back a few feet and began to cast Aeroga, imagining how much curvier the behemoth girl will be once she gets ballooned out by the spell. However, you pray that no elemental was in your presence while the spell was in progress. "I liked it better when you didn't have a wait period while casting the fucking spell." You thought.
1512111.title: Casting Aeroga

choices: She turns buff and even more buxom
15121111.content:
Unfortunately for you, a nearby air elemental sensed you casting aeroga, but instead of bombarding you with its own spells, it picks you up in its tornado, taking you with it over to the behemoth lady. "Oh shit, I knew this waiting time thing while casting spells was a dumbass idea." You think angrily as you were now just feet in front of the behemoth babe.

The air elemental didn't stop there, however, as it appeared to be fascinated with the purple beauty because of the heart-shaped clouds forming over it. "Wow, I didn't know elementals could show emotion... let alone, affection." You thought, as you witness the elemental hover very closely over the behemoth femme's body. The elemental casted its Aeroga spell on the behemoth girl, then you watched as the behemoth babe grew. You have no idea how she grew, though, as you cover your eyes.
15121111.title: Air elemental interference

choices: Hug and grope the behemoth lady
Hide, then ogle the purple beauty
151211112.content:
As you uncover your eyes, you saw that the behemoth lady's butt cheeks and boobs were now four feet wide each. "Oh, now's my chance to cast it to make her even bigger." You thought as you began chanting the Aeroga spell to make her even curvier. This time, the pervy air elemental just lets you cast the spell without retaliating. As you got the spell off, the behemoth girl's hourglass figure became twice as big, meaning her bosom and rump were eight feet wide now. "Now that's a beauty I can actually cuddle with." You said, as you get closer to her.

The air elemental, on the other hand, sealed itself into the big crystal of the behemoth babe's necklace. You, then, began to nosebleed as you thought of looking at her breasts and her big butt. You got a hard-on after a few minutes of staring at her, but not before she woke up and stood up at an impressive eight feet tall. She felt her enlarged bosom, and murred in pleasure at the new size. She was completely oblivious of you as she admired her figure.

"Oooooh, I never knew there would be fans of me." She said, feeling her poofed-out butt. You felt an insatiable urge to glomp and grope the behemoth beauty, but your judgement reminds you of how dangerous behemoths are when angry. At this point, you were faced with a choice: Glomp the behemoth beauty and risk your life or try to hide and just observe her closely without her noticing you.
151211112.title: The T&A femme behemoth

choices: She tosses you aside like rotten fruit
1512111121.content:
The behemoth girl turns her attention to you in confusion at the look in your eyes. "Excuse me sir." She said, "Why are you looking at me like that?" "I can't take it anymore." You thought, completely overwhelmed by the urge to glomp the purple bombshell herself. You, then, run into her at full speed, mashing your face into her asset and groping her butt cheeks.

The behemoth girl gasped and began blushing bright red as she felt her assets mashing into your face and her butt was groped. She was in complete shock, though it was giving her a brief amount of time to think about you. Your conscience was having a sinking feeling in showing your affection to her like that. How that will actually play out will be, of course, up to the behemoth girl herself.
1512111121.title: Giving in to the urge

choices: Make her figure twice as big
Balloon her curves until you both float
15121111211.content:
The behemoth femme, taking your glomp as a strong sign of admiration few of her "fans" would give her in return, wraps both arms around you and hugs you back. You were not expecting that sort of response, though of course you were relieved that it didn't end badly. That didn't stop there, however, as she picked you up and closed her eyes as she kissed you deeply. "Wait, is it just me or is there something about that necking thing?" You think to yourself, "Whatever, spending time with this babe beats watching those Viera walk by."

You return the kiss, by blowing into her a bit by accident, causing her hourglass figure to swell out two more feet wide. She giggled from the expansion. "It's ok, honey." The behemoth femme said, nuzzling your face into her chest. "I'm definitely used to this sort of thing." She smiled at you as she rubbed your back. You look her in the eye. "Would you mind telling me your name, miss?" You ask, "My name is Minda." The purple beauty replied, "And, to be honest, I'm actually surprised to know that you, of all humes, would actually show your admiration to me." "To be honest, I admire every beastgirl who is capable of having their bodies expanded." You sheepishly reply. "Oh really..." Minda said, "...well, then you'll have a lot of fun with the rest of my sisters."

"That doesn't mean I don't have time to have a little fun with you now." You think to yourself with a grin, as you think of how big to blow Minda up.
15121111211.title: The purple beauty's luckiest fan

151211112112.content:
You rub the crystal on Minda's necklace, causing the air elemental to blow up the behemoth beauty's hourglass figure balloon out 500 feet wide, making her a living blimp. You saddled onto Minda's titanic rump and rubbed away at her cheeks. Minda murred as she rubbed her boobs. "Mmmmmmmm... I bet you'd want to do it with me and my sisters when we get to my paradise." She said, as she floated towards a huge floating island known as behemoth island.

"D-do it with them?" You think, "This just keeps getting better and better... as long as I don't think about that too much." You and Minda reached the island, seeing that there are two more behemoth babes like her welcoming the two of you in. "I wonder what she mean by "doing it" with them." You wonder. The two behemoth girls climb onto Minda's butt and sit right next to you. "Would you mind ballooning us both when we get to the village?" One of them said.
151211112112.title: Hot air balloon babe

info.brief_description: WG & Inflation of the various and diverse creatures from the Final Fantasy series
info.description:
The humes of Final Fantasy get plenty of attention, but this is your chance to play around with the many, many creatures of the various Final Fantasy games. Fatten them up, inflate them like balloons, or make them disgusting slobs. There are no rules, just enjoy to your hearts content.

Human characters are allowed if it moves things along, but preferably would not be the main subject.

Vore is also allowed, though try to keep it running into it's own thread where applicable.
